{{Infobox TV channel | name = Disney Channel
The Netherlands & Flanders | logofile = Disney Channel wordmark.svg| | logosize = 200px | logoalt = | logo2 = | launch = 3 October 2009 | closed date = | picture format = | share = | share as of = | share source = | network = | owner = [[The Walt Disney Company]] | slogan = Dat moet je meemaken! | country = [[The Netherlands]] / [[Flanders]] | language = [[Dutch language|Dutch]] / [[English language|English]] | broadcast area = [[The Netherlands]]
[[Belgium]] | headquarters = | former names = | replaced names = | sister names = [[Disney XD (Netherlands)|Disney XD]] | timeshift names = | web = [http://www.disney.nl/DisneyChannel www.disneychannel.nl] [http://www.disney.be/DisneyChannel www.disneychannel.be] | terr serv 1 = | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = | sat chan 1 = | cable serv 1 = [[UPC Netherlands|UPC]] (Netherlands) | cable chan 1 = Channel 20 & check local cable listings | cable serv 2 = [[Telenet (Belgium)|Telenet]] Digital TV | cable chan 2 = Channel 29 (Flanders)
Channel 119 (Brussels) | cable serv 3 = [[Telenet (Belgium)|Telenet]] | cable chan 3 = check local cable listings on [http://www.zenders.be zenders.be] | adsl serv 1 = [[Belgacom TV]] (Belgium) | adsl chan 1 = Channel 133 }} '''Disney Channel The Netherlands & Flanders''' ''(or Disney Channel)'' is the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] edition of the [[Disney Channel]], owned by the [[Walt Disney Company]] Before 6PM all series will be broadcast in Dutch/Flemish dub, after 6PM series from Disney Channel and ABC Family are broadcast in English language with Dutch subtitles, except Animated series and shows only for the Dutch/Flemish market. It launched on October 3, 2009 exclusively on [[UPC Netherlands]], and since November 1 in Belgium on [[Telenet]] Digital TV and [[Belgacom]] TV, now it is also available on [[Ziggo]] in the Netherlands too Since June 22 Telenet added Disney Channel to their basic cable. The Belgian version is almost identical to the version of The Netherlands, the only exception is that the announcements are made in [[Flemish]]. The Disney Channel is scheduled to broadcast only Digital on 1 September on Ziggo and on October 2011 on Caiway. ==Launch date== * October 3, 2009 - Launched Disney Channel in [[Netherlands]]. * November 1, 2009 - Launched Disney Channel in [[Belgium]]. * June 22, 2010 - Disney Channel was added to Telenet's basic cable listings. ==Programming== Programmes shown by Disney Channel. ===Cartoons=== *''[[Totally Spies]]'' *''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' *''[[Brandy & Mr. Whiskers]]'' *''[[Casper's Scare School (TV series)|Casper's Scare School]]'' *''[[The Tofus]]'' *''[[The Replacements (TV series)|The Replacements]]'' *''[[Kim Possible]]'' *''[[The Emperor's New School]]'' *''[[The Little Mermaid]]'' *''[[Recess (TV series)|Recess]]'' *''[[Jimmy Two-Shoes]]'' *''[[The Kids from Room 402]]'' *''[[W.I.T.C.H.]]'' *''[[Famous 5: On the Case]]'' *''[[A Kind Of Magic]]'' *''[[Stoked (TV series)|Stoked]]'' *''[[Jacob Two-Two (TV series)]]'' *''[[The Legend of Tarzan]]'' *''[[Wunschpunsch]]'' *''[[Fish Hooks]]'' *''[[Lilo & Stitch: The Series]]'' *''[[Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers]]'' ===Series=== *''[[Brian O'Brian]]'' *''[[Cory in the House]]'' *''[[JONAS]]'' *''[[JONAS L.A.]]'' *''[[Phil Of The Future]]'' *''[[That's So Raven]]'' *''[[Cory In The House]]'' *''[[Hannah Montana]] *''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'' *''[[The Suite Life of Zack and Cody]]'' *''[[Sonny with A Chance]]'' *''[[Studio DC: Almost Live]]'' *''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'' *''[[Jake and Blake]]'' *''[[Hannah Montana (season 4)]]'' *''[[Good Luck Charlie]]'' *''[[Fish Hooks]]'' *''[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]]'' *''[[Hotnews.NL]]'' *''[[My Babysitter's a Vampire (TV series)]]'' ===Upcoming Cartoons/Series/Movies=== * ''[[A.N.T.
